title: Qubes OS Translation Meetup
description:
Meetup for people interested in translating Qubes OS website, docs and the system itself.
Come over if you'd like to help with translating Qubes OS website/docs/tools into languages that are not English! It's easy - there's a website to do translating on :) There will be a brief introduction to the translation process and a bit of organizing to create language teams.Links: https://github.com/maiska/qubes-translation-orga/wiki/translation-guidelines-dochttps://github.com/maiska/qubes-translation-orga/wiki/Translation-Conventions
